meanings.definition: To change the zoning classification of a piece of land.
meanings.sent1: The city council decided to rezone the area for commercial development.
meanings.sent2: It is necessary to rezone the land from residential to industrial use.
meanings.sent3: Why did the land want to rezone itself? To become a bustling business hub!
meanings.sent4: The decision to rezone the land was a bold move that sparked new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The process to rezone the area involved careful planning and community input.

meanings.definition: The act of changing the zoning classification of a piece of land.
meanings.sent1: The rezoning of the neighborhood led to increased property values.
meanings.sent2: After the rezone, the area became more attractive to investors.
meanings.sent3: The rezone party was a hit, with everyone celebrating the new zoning rules.
meanings.sent4: The impact of the rezone on the community was immediately noticeable.
meanings.sent5: The city's decision to rezone sparked a lot of discussion among residents.
